transcript: somebody who's very good at running knows how to make the AC of running very rewarding even if you're on the treadmill you're like okay I only have four more minutes of five right because what you're doing is you're trying to pull forward the reward so that you can reinforce yourself for staying on the path and so I think finding those different ways to measure like the more ways you can measure the more ways you can win and so I try and find those things along the way so that the progress itself becomes the win
